translation.en: and learn from it.

translation.es: El problema era que nadie había escaneado bebés despiertos.

translation.en: The youngest awake brains we had seen were five years old.

translation.en: And there is a good reason for that.
translation.es: Y hay una buena razón para eso.

translation.en: For an adult in an MRI machine,

translation.en: the way we do that experiment is we say, "Okay, lie down
translation.es: A un adulto que se hace una resonancia, le decimos: Recuéstese y no se mueva durante dos horas, por favor.

translation.en: and hold perfectly still for two hours, please."
translation.es: Recuéstese y no se mueva durante dos horas, por favor.

translation.en: There was no way a baby would last two hours.
translation.es: Eso era imposible para un bebé.

translation.en: So the question was: what was the longest time a baby could last,
translation.es: Debíamos pensar en cuál era el máximo de tiempo que aguantaría,

translation.en: and what's the shortest time an MRI experiment could be,

translation.en: and was there any overlap?

translation.en: less sensitive, in order to make them more quiet
